member.name: TTGETTITLE
member.summary: Provides information about the title of a tooltip control.

member.name: TTGETTITLE.dwSize
member.summary: DWORD that specifies size of structure. Set to sizeof(TTGETTITLE).

member.name: TTGETTITLE.uTitleBitmap
member.summary: UINT that specifies the tooltip icon.

member.name: TTGETTITLE.cch
member.summary: UINT that specifies the number of characters in the title.

member.name: TTGETTITLE.pszTitle
member.summary: Pointer to a wide character string that contains the title.
